title: AWS S3 Resources
description: File resources that can be retrieved from an Amazon Web Services S3 file store.

tags.name: s3
tags.title: AWS S3
tags.description: The resource is in an Amazon Web Services S3 file store.

forms.name: s3-rdata-file
forms.title: R data file - AWS S3
forms.description: File resource in R data format. The file will be downloaded from an Amazon Web Services S3 file store.

items.title: R object class
items.description: The primary class of the R object that is being loaded from the R data file. When there are several objects of this class, the one with the symbol with same name as the resource is chosen, otherwise the first one is selected.

credentials.description: Credentials are optional. If not provided, it will default to AWS environment variables (if they exist).

items.title: AWS key
items.description: The AWS Access Key ID. If missing, defaults to value stored in environment variable `AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID`.

items.title: AWS secret
items.description: The AWS Secret Access Key. If missing, defaults to value stored in environment variable `AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY`.

forms.name: s3-tidy-file
forms.title: Tidy data file - AWS S3
forms.description: File resource in tidy format, having a reader in the [tidyverse](https://www.tidyverse.org) ecosystem. The file will be downloaded from an Amazon Web Services S3 file store.

items.title: Format
items.description: Data format that can help when trying to coerce the file content to a data.frame.

credentials.description: Credentials are optional. If not provided, it will default to AWS environment variables (if they exist).

items.title: AWS key
items.description: The AWS Access Key ID. If missing, defaults to value stored in environment variable `AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID`.

items.title: AWS secret
items.description: The AWS Secret Access Key. If missing, defaults to value stored in environment variable `AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY`.
